segments.text: I have applied for a transfer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Do you mean that you are leaving ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I think it's time to move on . I â€™ Ve already been here too long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where do you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I want to be transferred to the Shanghai office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will miss you . But anyway I wish you every success at your new post .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . It's been a pleasure working with you .
segments.speaker: S1
